summary: Farm to Fire - ember is a locally-owned, high-energy eatery located at 70 Retreat Village on Saint Simons Island. The menu is written daily and is inspired by the flavors and traditions of Southeastern United States cuisine. A global influence denoting European and Asian fair are also important contributors. Our ingredients are sourced from local farmers and fishermen and are inspired by wood-fired cooking. Our craft beverage program focuses on the use of fresh ingredients and includes a variety of unique wines, innovative Southern brews, house-infused specialty cocktails, and a vast selection of premium spirits. All of this is served in a fun and contemporary atmosphere at achievable prices. Dress is smart casual.
